scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Gumble's Yard
scrape.text: Paul Lohman, an ex-teacher and his brother Serge (opposition leader and likely next Dutch prime minister) meet with their wives in an expensive restaurant and over dinner (the chapters set out over the different courses) discuss a major issue with their children than has previously been unspoken even within couples but which all of them know: that their two fifteen year old sons committed a notorious crime: the assault and eventual murder of a homeless lady. An unpleasant book â€“ largely ruined by the preposterous genetic explanation (which if set in the future may have been plausible but not 15 years ago).
